root: ^I've been working my whiskers off for months and hardly any customers come in.
^Aunt Judy always said, 'Managing the store is a constant battle!'
^What a weird thing to say since the store is so empty. No wonder she was in so much debt.
^Hmm. I know why no one comes in. There's something so spooky about this place.
^Every meow and then, I feel like I'm being watched.
^I've never even been in the back storeroom - it gives me the creeps.
^But it's silly, right? What could pawssibly be there? Some boxes? A mop?
^It's time to stop being a timid kitten. I need to get this shop in order.
